mapper.insert: insert into members (MID, MTYPE, MNAME, BIRTH, GENDER, ADDRESS, SNO, EMAIL, PASSWORD, ORGAN, PHONE, POSITION) values (#{mid}, #{mtype}, #{mname}, sysdate, #{gender}, #{address}, #{sno}, #{email}, #{password}, #{organ}, #{phone}, #{position})

insert into members (MID, MTYPE, MNAME, BIRTH, GENDER, ADDRESS, SNO, EMAIL, PASSWORD, ORGAN, PHONE, POSITION, FILE_DATA , FILE_TYPE , FILE_NAME , SAVED_DATE)
values (#{mid}, #{mtype}, #{mname}, sysdate, #{gender}, #{address}, #{sno}, #{email}, #{password}, #{organ}, #{phone}, #{position}, #{fileData}, #{fileType}, #{fileName}, #{savedDate} )
